content: knitted jumper in drops snow piece is knitted top down in stocking stitch with raglan pattern ee-771 yarn group e or c + c **size** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **yarn** drops snow from garnstudio 700-750-850-900-1000-1100 g colour 15 dark blue **needles** drops circular needles size 8 mm 40 and 80 cm long drops circular needles size 6 mm 40 and 80 cm long drops double pointed needles size 8 mm drops double pointed needles size 6 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need circular needle of 80 cm in each size **knitting gauge** 11 stitches and 15 row in stocking stitch on 8 mm needles = 10 x 10 cm
